::KitKat::
She looked at him, with utter shock on her face. "Me? I...do all 
that? I kill Megatron and the Allience? How? When? Where? With 
whom? " She sat back in the chair staring at the hologram.


DarkMouse:;
She listened and looke at Drillbit."I will never say another thing 
about her again." She looked at Drillbit with total suprize on her 
face."Whoah. That's quite a girlfriend you got there Drillbit."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>    gABRIEL SAT DOWN. HIS EYES FULL OF DETERMINATION. HE PULLED OUT 
A DEVISE. 
> IT SHOWED A STATUE OF KIT KAT. THE MEMORIAL TO HER IN THE CAPTITAL 
CITY. HE 
> FACE WAS NOT ON IT FOR THERE WHERE NO DATATRACKS IN THE FUTURE OF 
WHAT SHE 
> LOOKED LIKE. INSCRIBED AT THE BOTTOM OF THE HOLOGRAM WAS THE 
PHRASE.."LET OUR 
> PATHS LEAD WHERE THEY MAY." kIT kAT.PAST EARTH. DAY OF DESTRUCTION.
>     THAT IS WHAT THEY NAMED THE DAY OF THE FALL OF THE ALLIANCE. HE 
HOPED SHE 
> WOULD UNDERSTAND. "MY LEGEND YOU ARE MORE IMPORTANT THEN YOU KNOW. 
YOU LEAD 
> THE FIGHT AGAINST THE ALLAINCE. YOU SAVE THE PREDACON EMPIRE. IT IS 
ALSO THE 
> DAY THE THE GREAT MEGATRON WAS DESTROYED. BY YOUR HAND. THIER ARE 
TALES OF 
> YOU AND DESTRUCTOR. HOW YOU JOURNEYED THROUGH THE UNIVERSE MAKEING 
A TOTAL 
> PREDACON RULE. BUT SOMEONE IS DESTROYING MY WORLD.  SOMEONE HAS 
TAMPERED WITH 
> THE TIME STREAM. THE ALLAINCE IS WINNING. IF YOU WANT THIS 
FUTURE..YOU MUSY 
> FUFILL YOUR DESTINY. DESTROY THE ALLIANCE OR ALL IS LOST"
